channel.title: 50+ players with no lag?
channel.description: Every time i look around on server advertisement, i see servers holding 40, 50 , 70, and ever 100 players+.... i go on theres is no lag, and its really fun. But now i want to make my own server, this would be my 4th one. and i want it to stay for a long time, and have 50 players on with no lag. But when i make mine, it lags with 8-20 players. Any ideas on why i lag and others dont? * things about my computer* Its brand new, custem built computer, It has 2 gigs of RAM, 222+ gigs of harddrive, (About 210gigs of freespace). Also, i use charter highspeed internet, i have a router, but i dont use, because port forwarding never works, so i use modem only. I also tired using hamchi only, still laggy, tried no-ip only, still laggy, tried them both, and yes, still laggy Thanks -tyrael-

item.title: 50+ players with no lag?
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

If you use modem you should have a better connection

Every time i look around on server advertisement, i see servers holding 40, 50 , 70, and ever 100 players+… i go on theres is no lag, and its really fun.
But now i want to make my own server, this would be my 4th one. and i want it to stay for a long time, and have 50 players on with no lag.

  • things about my computer*

    It has 2 gigs of RAM, 222+ gigs of harddrive, (About 210gigs of freespace).
    Also, i use charter highspeed internet, i have a router, but i dont use, because port forwarding never works, so i use modem only.
